name: StopDyingThere
description: Plays lines from Cold's iconic video whenever you die in GD

disableinpractice.name: Disable in practice mode
disableinpractice.description: Disables the mod while playing in practice mode or from a StartPos.

disableinplat.name: Disable in platformer levels
disableinplat.description: Disables the mod while playing in a platformer level.

levelcomplete.name: Play on level completion
levelcomplete.description: Plays Cold's celebration when you beat a level.

customize.name: Play sound effects on:
customize.description: Customize when death sound effects are played.

threshold.name: Far attempt threshold (%)
threshold.description: Minimum percentage at which the mod considers an attempt to be "far" (used to choose what SFX to play). If "Play sound effects" is set to "Far attempts", sound effects will not play before this percentage.

censored.name: Profane sound effects
censored.description: Censor or disable profane lines in the mod.

volume.name: Volume (%)
volume.description: Set the mod's volume- sfx are VERY LOUD so low volume recommended.
